title: ADi varum azhaginai
sahitya:
(rAgA:  khamAs)   
  ADi varum azhaginaik-koNDADugirad-akhilamellAm nI ADi varum azhaginai


anupallavi

  kOtit-tavam sheidirukka gOpiyargaL tammuDanE nADi brndAvanam tanilE kUDi kuzhalUdik-kaLit-


caraNam 1    mellat-tavamum tenral unran mEnmai ellAm pADudu shala shalattu Odum yamunai shErndu tALam pODudu nilai mranda nIla vAnil shuDar iraNDu kUDudu nila maghaLin pashum karangaL ninnait-tazhuva nADudu
    caraNam 2  			(rAgA:  hamsAnandi)Aa:S R1 G3 M2 D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 M2 G3 R1 S  karuttaiyaLLum mEni tanil kulaviyadu kAyAm pU aruL pozhiyum nayanam tanil
 virindadiru shen kamalam arumbum muruval idazhinilE polindadu mullai mOhanamAi
 azhagu kumudam aNaindiDumighu kazhalil shilambu konjavE
    caraNam 3    			(rAgA:  tilang)Aa:S G3 M1 P N3 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 G3 S  pEruyarnda dEvar kuzhAm pirandanarO kOvalarAi pirivu tALA anbarunait-toDarndanarO
 karavaigaLAi aravaNai tAn taru nizhalAi avani tanil niraindaduvO marai nAngum maraindu
 olittadO malar karattin kuzhalishaiyODu
